  • Uses of Player in sysobj

    Subclasses of Player in sysobj
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AIPlayer
    AI Player extends Player, but implements a few methods that Player doesn't need, mainly to do with determining if they have a legal move, what move they should take, and what card they should play if they choose to play a card.
